context.summary: Added CLI wrapper exports to index.ts. Implementation was already complete covering all 5 acceptance criteria.

context.summary: 55 new tests written covering classifyOutputLine, createCallbackEventSender, createHttpEventSender, ClaudeCliWrapper lifecycle, createCliWrapperFromEnv, and event lifecycle integration. All 104 tests pass.
